did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: William B. Gould IV NLRB Papers, 2004-2001
did.physdesc: Articles, reports, pamphlets, correspondence, photographs, transcripts, news clippings, records.
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: The collection consists of correspondence, Congressional hearing files, and some case files from William B. Gould IV's tenure as the chairman of the NLRB.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Most of this collection dates from Gould's confirmation as Chairman of the NLRB in 1994 to his resignation in 1998. The collection includes material relating to his confirmation hearing. There are the official Congressional documents as well as documents, news clippings, and letters both opposing and supporting his confirmation. Also included are the NLRB Executive Chronological File, 1994-1998, correspondence with members of Congress, NLRB memoranda, NLRB press releases, and Gould's NLRB Diary. Congressional hearing files and NLRB case files make up a substantial part of the collection. Also significant are the speeches he gave as the Chairman of the NLRB.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: U.S. House of Representatives Subcommittee on Labor, Health and Human Services, Education, and Related Agencies

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: William B. Gould IV NLRB Papers #6391. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
